channel.title: WG call - 26th September
channel.description:
After a [little confusion][1] @siemvaessen @danmihaila @JohnAdams @bjwebb & @stevieflow spent 30 minutes discussion the WG and next steps:
**Actions**:
- We agreed a **[feature matrix][2]** on existing APIs requires action - We agreed that more analysis and discussion on @TimDavies [**API Working Draft**][3] was a priority
**Next call**
Next call is schedule for **[10.30AM GMT - 31st October 2014][4]**.
[1]: http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/scheduling-a-regular-api-wg-call/92 [2]: http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/what-apis-exist-currently/72/2?u=stevieflow [3]: http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/api-standard-resources/65/3 [4]: http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/wg-call-31st-october-2014/101

item.title: WG call - 26th September
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
After a little confusion @siemvaessen @danmihaila @JohnAdams @bjwebb & @stevieflow spent 30 minutes discussion the WG and next steps:

Actions:

  • We agreed a feature matrix on existing APIs requires action
  • We agreed that more analysis and discussion on @TimDavies API Working Draft was a priority

Next call

Next call is schedule for 10.30AM GMT - 31st October 2014.

Read full topic
